content: Chenren Xu I am looking for highly self-motivated Postdoc, Ph.D. students and undergrads to work on the design, implementation and evaluation of wireless and IoT/XG networking systems for mobile and ubiquitous computing in the smart transportation, logistics, manufacturing and health domains.
